ovdesc.p: This table is used to setup properties related to a company in the payments hub.

desc.p: Indicates the date on which the cut-over file which should be uploaded or be reported on.
Indicates how the received BIC file from SWIFT is to be processed by the payments hub.
D - Delta. Delta file from SWIFT will be used for BIC upload.
F - Full. Full file from SWIFT will be used for BIC upload.
Indicates the offset days to be considered while deriving the exact date on which BIC upload job needs to be executed.
If the system date is equal or greater than the ‘BICuploadCutOverDate minus the BICuploadJobOffsetDays’, the job needs to be executed.
Indicates the directory location where files from SWIFT will be placed in order to start executing the BIC upload job in the payments hub.
Indicates the type of action and report to be performed and generated respectively in BIC upload process.
U - Upload and Report. BIC upload job is run and report is generated based on upload file.
R - Report only. BIC upload job is not run but only a report is generated based on the upload file.
S - Static Data Report only. BIC upload job is not run but a report is generated based on the static tables.
B - Both Reports. BIC upload job is not run but both reports ie. a report based on the upload file and a report based on the static table is generated.
Indicates the location where the reports related to BIC upload jobs should be placed by the payments hub.
Indicates the schedule for the BIC upload job in the payments hub.
M - Monthly. BIC upload job is run on monthly basis.
D - Daily. BIC upload job is run on daily basis.
Specifies the directory path where the export files of billing interface are archived.
Specifies the directory path where the export files of billing interface are delivered.
Specifies how billing process will extract records from static data tables in the payments hub.
D - Delta. Billing program will extract only the changes done in static data tables since the last date on which Billing program was run. This program will read field “BillingPreviousProcessingDate”.
F- Full. Billing program will extract all records from static data tables.
Specifies the last date on which payment/static data files were sent to the billing application. This date is particularly used for extracting delta information from the static data tables.
